name: Barberries
properties: Better choice than raisins for weight loss
benefits: Barberries are highlighted as a superior choice to raisins for weight loss optimization. They have AMPK-activating properties that help boost metabolism. Their anti-inflammatory compounds support overall health while providing natural sweetness to breakfast dishes.
amount: Use as dried fruit alternative in breakfast dishes

quotes: If we did want to use dried, as we learned in the Amping AMPK and Inflammation Quenchers sections, barberries or gojis might be a better choice.
